basics.name: Kendrick Sin
basics.label: Snr. Business Development
basics.summary: Highly motivated and results-driven Business Development generalist with Product/Project Manager experience, and a proven track record in business development, innovation, and technology implementation. Experienced in managing complex, multi-stakeholder projects across diverse industries, with a focus on cloud migration and digital transformation. Fluent in English, Chinese, and Thai, with a talent for building strong relationships across cultural boundaries.

work.name: Alibaba Cloud Thailand
work.summary: Manage business development and project delivery for cloud solutions
highlights: Lead end-to-end project lifecycle management, ensuring on-time delivery and client satisfaction with short response times to critical issues
Implement robust project tracking systems, resulting in improved project visibility and reduction in delays with 100% project delivery rate to date
Conduct regular project status updates to stakeholders, maintaining clear communication channels from working level to higher management

work.name: Alibaba Cloud ISV
work.summary: Led product lifecycle management and market expansion across Southeast Asia
highlights: Spearheaded the introduction of innovative Chinese technologies to the South East Asian market, managing the entire product lifecycle
Developed and executed project plans for market entry, resulting in successful launches in 3 countries within 8 months
Implemented Agile methodologies in product development, aligned product roadmap to meet customers' requirements, increasing in 300% uptake of software in local market
Balanced lean operating costs with project revenue, to answer to investors
Successfully closed deals with 5 major clients, resulting in 1200% year-over-year revenue growth

work.name: Morphosis Apps
work.summary: Led Agile development team for e-commerce application
highlights: Led an Agile development team of 20+ members in building a brand-new e-commerce application
Utilized Jira workflows to conduct Scrum processes
Ensured project kept up with timeline, while maintaining high quality standards
Implemented a requirement gathering process, reducing scope creep by 50% and improving estimation accuracy

work.name: Singapore Armed Forces
work.summary: Managed innovation projects and developed technology solutions for military operations
highlights: Managed a portfolio of six organization-scale innovation projects valued at up to $5 million each
Consistently delivered two Minimum Viable Products bi-annually, with 100% progressing to full implementation
Led the development of a predictive material provisioning system, reducing inventory costs by 30% and improving supply chain efficiency
Introduced gamification elements to naval warfare training, increasing trainee engagement by 300% and introduced metric tracking for warfighting trainees

work.name: Singapore Armed Forces
work.summary: Served as naval officer in the Singapore Armed Forces

education.studyType: Bachelor of Engineering with specialization in Systems Engineering (1st Class Honours)
education.additional: Two student exchange programs in Bangkok, professional Thai language training, participated in multiple volunteer engineering camps and social causes

awards.title: John Cheung Overseas Attachment Award
awards.summary: Awarded for outstanding academic performance coupled with enriching overseas work experience during student exchange and internship at Bangkok

certificates.name: Google Cloud Computing Associate Cloud Engineer (ACE)
Diploma in Leadership and People Management
